titleStmt.title: The hearers duty a sermon preached at Anne Aldersgate, London at the finishing of the morning execise at that church / by Mr. Christopher Love ...
titleStmt.author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

editionStmt.edition: Revised and corrected according to his own notes.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. for George and Henry Eversden ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
